text: <extra_id_0> Con A <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> stimulation was found to increase both binding of AP-1 to the AP-1 consensus sequence , TRE , and AP-1 enhancer activity , in Jurkat cells .
PMA was also found to increase the AP-1 enhancer activity , whereas elevation of Ca2+ or cAMP had only minor effects .

We conclude that stimulation with mitogenic lectins is sufficient to increase both <extra_id_0> c-Fos <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> c-Jun <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> protein levels , AP-1 binding and AP-1 enhancer activity in Jurkat cells and that they act via mechanisms that could involve the activation of <extra_id_0> PKC <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> .
